nml_option.name: config_surface_gravity_wave_vert_levels
nml_option.description: Number of vertical levels in surface gravity wave test case. Typical value is 20.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive integer number greater than 0.

nml_option.name: config_surface_gravity_wave_use_distances
nml_option.description: Logical flag that determines if locations of features are defined by distances of fractions. False means fractions.

nml_option.name: config_surface_gravity_wave_bottom_depth
nml_option.description: Depth of the bottom of the ocean for the surface gravity wave test case.

nml_option.name: config_surface_gravity_wave_salinity
nml_option.description: Salinity of the water in the entire domain.

nml_option.name: config_surface_elevation_to_mean_depth_ratio
nml_option.description: Ratio of the maximum surface elevation to the mean depth.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real number (preferably much) smaller than unity.

nml_option.name: config_Gaussian_surface_elevation_decay_scale
nml_option.description: Decay scale of the initial Gaussian surface elevation in the meridional direction.
nml_option.possible_values: Any positive real number (preferably smaller than 12.5% of the meridional extent of the domain).
